title: Wrangell - St Elias National Park & Preserve: Sport Hunting Guides
body: Sport Hunting Guides       Kichatna Guide Service Malaspina Sport Hunt Concession  Master Guide: Donald Kann 907-235-7313 www.alaskabearandsheephunting.com     Devil's Mountain Guide Service  Nabesna River Sport Hunt Concession Master Guide: Kirk Ellis 907-822-5312 www.ebgg.biz   Ellis Big Game Guides & Outfitters Jacksina Glacier Sport Hunt Concession Nabesna Glacier Sport Hunt Concession Master Guide: Cole Ellis 907-822-5312 www.ebgg.biz   Gakona Guide Service Capital Mountain Sport Hunt Concession Master Guide: Chuck McMahan 907-822-3553   JM Guide Service Chetaslina Sport Hunt Concession Master Guide: Johnny McMahan 907-822-5925   Majestic Mountain Outfitters Snag Creek Sport Hunt Concession Master Guide: Jeff Chadd 406-347-5401 www.majesticmountainoutfitters.com    Ptarmigan Lake Lodge Ptarmigan Lake Sport Hunt Concession Master Guide: Urban Rahoi 907-456-6967   Rough & Ready Guide Service Gilahina Sport Hunt Concession Master Guide: Kelly Vrem 907-745-8736 www.vrem.com   Solo Creek Guide Service Solo Creek Sport Hunt Concession Master Guide: Thomas Vaden 907-355-4281 www.solocreekguideservices.com   Ultima Thule Outfitters Mt. Holmes Sport Hunt Concession Barnard Glacier Sport Hunt Concession Cayon Creek Sport Hunt Concession Master Guide: Paul Claus 907-854-4500 www.ultimathulelodge.com   Wrangell Outfitters Horsfeld Sport Hunt Concession Master Guide: Will Koehler 907-803-0668 907-323-3034 www.wrangelloutfitters.com   These listings are provided as a service to our visitors and imply no specific endorsement by the National Park Service or Wrangell-St. Elias National Park and Preserve.
